import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-post-create', templateUrl: './post-create.component.html', styleUrls: ['./post-create.component.scss'] }) export class PostCreateComponent { panelOpenState = false; } This is the expansion title This is a summary of the content

This is the primary content of the panel.

 Self aware panel Currently I am {{ panelOpenState ? "open" : "closed" }}

I'm visible because I am open
